Hello guys I have a question for rails developers
Any one tried to add faye-rails gem to his app before
https://github.com/jamesotron/faye-rails
I want to publish and subscribe from the controller layer not the view and got stuck in adding the js call back for the publish event
I can't find any hooks to add the js code to handle a new message pushed in a channel if I am using the controller to pub/sub 
Any help?
